name: Relic
description: RELIC is a token which is an FAAS (Farming as a Service) used for DEFI Farming and Synthetic Real Estate. The purpose of MasRelic is to build a community of token holders that can earn passive income through high yielding opportunities. Our strategy is a meticulous mixture of staking and building masternodes, adding to liquidity pools, and low - medium risk yield farming. We are your typical FAAS token with an integration of Synthetic Real Estate Assets. The main purpose is to join DEFI and Real Estate together in one platform .
